name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **Python**, **FastAPI**, **PostgreSQL**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **AWS**. I have a proven track record of building and deploying high-performance, reliable, and reproducible applications in compliance with industry standards. My focus on **CI/CD**, **unit testing**, **automated quality assurance**, and **integration testing** ensures the delivery of robust solutions that meet strict reliability metrics.
I bring a comprehensive background in full-stack development, leveraging **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** to create scalable and secure applications. My deep cloud experience with **AWS** and **Azure** supports the development of enterprise-grade platforms. Additionally, I have expertise in designing microservices architectures and deploying machine learning models, incorporating frameworks like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for MLOps workflows. I excel at integrating advanced technologies, such as AI/ML capabilities, to drive predictive analytics and intelligent automation.
